trans-unit.source: Defines a connection point object that enables a server control acting as a provider to form a connection with a consumer.
trans-unit.target: 定義連接點物件，讓做為提供者的伺服器控制項建立與消費者之連接。

trans-unit.source: In every Web Parts connection between two server controls, each control must have (among other requirements) an associated connection point object that enables it to connect to the other control and to either provide or consume data, depending on whether the control is designated as the provider or consumer for the connection.
trans-unit.target: 在兩個伺服器控制項之間的每個 Web 組件連接，每個控制項必須 （還有其他需求） 相關聯的連接點物件，可讓它連接至其他控制項，並提供或取用資料，取決於是否控制項指定為提供者或消費者連接。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint> object in general contains the details for how a control can connect to another control and the type of data it can share.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>物件通常包含如何將控制項可以連接到另一個控制項，它可以共用的資料類型的詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: For a control acting as the provider in a connection, its connection point must be a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: 做為連接提供者的控制項，其連接點必須<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>物件。

trans-unit.source: For details on Web Parts connections and connection points, see the topics listed in the See Also section below.
trans-unit.target: 如需 Web 組件連接和連接點的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 另請參閱下一節中所列的主題。

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object, several steps are required:
trans-unit.target: 若要建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>物件時，還有數個步驟：

trans-unit.source: Create an interface.
trans-unit.target: 建立介面。

trans-unit.source: When a provider shares data with a consumer, it does so by getting an instance of an interface, and returning that instance to a consumer.
trans-unit.target: 當共用資料提供者與取用者時，它會取得介面的執行個體，並將該執行個體傳回給取用者。

trans-unit.source: Implement the interface in a provider.
trans-unit.target: 提供者中實作的介面。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control (any type of server control in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone can be used) that will be the provider must implement the interface created in the first step.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或其他伺服器控制項 (任何類型的伺服器控制項中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>可用區域)，將會提供者必須實作第一個步驟中所建立的介面。

trans-unit.source: Identify a callback method.
trans-unit.target: 識別回呼方法。

trans-unit.source: A method in the provider must be identified as the callback method to establish a connection.
trans-unit.target: 提供者中的方法，必須識別為回呼方法，以建立連接。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an instance of the implemented interface to a consumer.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回實作介面的執行個體的取用者。

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts approach for identifying a callback method in the provider is to add a `ConnectionProvider` metadata attribute (defined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionProviderAttribute> class) to the method that returns the interface instance.
trans-unit.target: 識別提供者中的回呼方法的 Web 組件方法是加入`ConnectionProvider`中繼資料屬性 (由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionProviderAttribute>類別) 傳回的介面執行個體的方法。

trans-unit.source: When the attribute is added, the only required parameter is a display name to use for the provider connection point.
trans-unit.target: 加入屬性時，唯一的必要的參數時要使用的提供者連接點的顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: Optional parameters can also be added, such as an ID for the connection point.
trans-unit.target: 可以加入選擇性參數也是，例如連接點的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: After a control has been equipped to act as a provider, the control can participate in connections (assuming that a consumer control is similarly equipped and available).
trans-unit.target: 控制項已具備做為提供者之後，此控制項可以參與連接 （假設，取用者控制項也備妥可用）。

trans-unit.source: To create a static, declarative connection in the markup of a Web page, developers can use the `<asp:webpartconnection>` element.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立靜態、 宣告式連接的網頁標記中，開發人員可以使用`<asp:webpartconnection>`項目。

trans-unit.source: If the `ConnectionProvider` attribute in the provider source code that identifies the callback method specifies an ID for the connection point, then that value must be assigned to the `ProviderConnectionPointID` attribute in the `<asp:webpartconnection>` element on a page.
trans-unit.target: 如果`ConnectionProvider`屬性提供者的原始碼識別的回呼方法中指定連接點的識別碼，則該值必須指派給`ProviderConnectionPointID`屬性`<asp:webpartconnection>`頁面上的元素。

trans-unit.source: One reason that a developer might specify an ID for a provider connection point is if there are multiple connection points in the provider control.
trans-unit.target: 開發人員可能會指定提供者連接點識別碼的其中一個原因是提供者控制項中是否有多個連接點。

trans-unit.source: If an ID is not specified for the provider connection point in the provider control, a value does not have to be assigned to the `ProviderConnectionPointID` attribute in the page either, because the connection will be created using a default value obtained from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint.DefaultID> field.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供者連接點提供者控制項中沒有指定的識別碼，值沒有指派給`ProviderConnectionPointID`頁面中，屬性，因為連接將使用預設值取自建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint.DefaultID>欄位。

trans-unit.source: To create a connection in code, developers must create a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.GetProviderConnectionPoints%2A> method and passing to it the ID of the provider control, along with the ID or index of the defined <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object in the provider control.
trans-unit.target: 若要在程式碼中建立的連接，開發人員必須建立新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>藉由呼叫物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.GetProviderConnectionPoints%2A>方法並傳遞給它的提供者的控制項，以及識別碼或索引的定義識別碼<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>提供者控制項中的物件。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object, along with a reference to the provider control, a reference to the consumer control, and a corresponding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object, are all passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A> method to create a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>參考提供者的控制項，以及物件的取用者控制項，和對應的參考<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>物件，全部都是傳遞至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A>方法來建立新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>物件。

trans-unit.source: Although developers can use provider connection points as part of establishing connections either declaratively or programmatically, users can also interact with provider connection points to establish connections through the user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: 雖然開發人員可以使用提供者連接點，以宣告方式或以程式設計方式建立連接的一部分，使用者也可以在與提供者連接點來建立連接，透過使用者介面 (UI) 互動。

trans-unit.source: If developers declare a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control on a Web page, it provides a run-time UI for users to create connections.
trans-unit.target: 如果開發人員宣告<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控制項在網頁上，它會提供執行階段的 UI，讓使用者能夠建立連接。

trans-unit.source: If users choose the consumer control as the starting point for establishing the connection by clicking its connect verb (they could also choose the provider; there is no difference in the resulting connection), in the UI they will see a drop-down list control with the display name of the available provider connection point (or points if there are multiple ones).
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者選擇為起點來建立連接，即可取用者控制其連接動詞命令 （也可以選擇提供者; 沒有任何差異，產生的連線中），它們會在 UI 中看到的下拉式清單控制項可用的提供者連接點 （或如果多個點） 的顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: Users must select a provider connection point to create a connection.
trans-unit.target: 使用者必須選取提供者連接點，以建立連接。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object associates directly with a specific provider control, and stores details about a connection in the properties it inherits from the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint> class.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>物件直接與特定的提供者控制項產生關聯，並將連線的相關詳細資料儲存在它所繼承自基底屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, in the inherited <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint.InterfaceType%2A> property, a provider connection point keeps the type of interface returned by the provider.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在繼承<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint.InterfaceType%2A>屬性，提供者連接點會持續提供者傳回的介面的型別。

trans-unit.source: If the provider and consumer in a connection both work with the same interface type, the controls are compatible and capable of forming a direct connection.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供者和消費者中都使用相同的連接介面型別，這些控制項是相容，並且能夠建立直接連接。

trans-unit.source: If the provider and consumer cannot work with the same interface type, they are incompatible and must use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> object to translate the provider connection point's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint.InterfaceType%2A> value into a type that the consumer can work with.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供者和消費者不能使用相同的介面類型，它們不相容，而且必須使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>物件翻譯的提供者連接點<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint.InterfaceType%2A>值到取用者可以使用的類型。

trans-unit.source: Another important inherited property is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint.DisplayName%2A> property, which provides a friendly name to display in the UI for users to choose a provider connection point when creating connections.
trans-unit.target: 另一個重要的繼承的屬性是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint.DisplayName%2A>屬性，提供易記的名稱，以顯示在 UI，供使用者選擇提供者連接點，當建立連接。

trans-unit.source: The display name is the required parameter when developers add a `ConnectionProvider` attribute to the callback method in a provider control.
trans-unit.target: 顯示名稱是必要的參數，當開發人員將`ConnectionProvider`屬性設定為提供者控制項的回呼方法。

trans-unit.source: The inherited <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint.ID%2A> property is also useful, as indicated above, because it provides a unique identifier for a provider connection point in the event that a provider has multiple connection points.
trans-unit.target: 繼承<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint.ID%2A>屬性也很有用，如前文所述，，因為它提供唯一的識別項的提供者連接點的提供者有多個連接點。

trans-unit.source: A provider can have multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> objects defined in it, and in this case, when developers add the `ConnectionProvider` attribute to a method, they should specify an ID value to distinguish each connection point.
trans-unit.target: 提供者可以有多個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>物件定義中，並在此情況下，當開發人員將`ConnectionProvider`屬性給方法時，他們應該指定區別每一個連接點識別碼值。

trans-unit.source: One other notable inherited property is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint.AllowsMultipleConnections%2A> property, which indicates whether a provider connection point can connect simultaneously to multiple consumers.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個其他值得注意繼承的屬性是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint.AllowsMultipleConnections%2A>屬性，指出提供者連接點是否可同時連接到多個取用者。

trans-unit.source: This property value is `true` by default for provider connection points (whereas it defaults to `false` for consumer connection points).
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性值`true`預設提供者連接點 (而其預設值為`false`的消費者連接點)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> class adds several unique methods to the members it inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>類別會加入數個唯一的方法它所繼承的成員從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint.GetObject%2A> method retrieves an instance of the interface that the callback method will return to consumers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint.GetObject%2A>方法會擷取回呼方法會傳回給取用者介面的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint.GetSecondaryInterfaces%2A> method retrieves additional consumer interfaces that are part of an existing connection, but are not the interfaces used to establish the connection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint.GetSecondaryInterfaces%2A>方法會擷取額外的消費者介面屬於現有的連接，但不是介面可用來建立連接。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows simple ways to create a connection declaratively, programmatically, or through the UI, in each case making use of a provider connection point.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示簡單的方法來以宣告方式建立的連接，以程式設計方式或透過 UI，在每個案例中使用的提供者連接點。

trans-unit.source: The example has four parts:
trans-unit.target: 此範例包含四個部分：

trans-unit.source: A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page.
trans-unit.target: 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件 頁面上顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: Source code for an interface and two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection.
trans-unit.target: 來源介面和兩個程式碼<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制做為提供者和消費者連接。

trans-unit.source: A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example.
trans-unit.target: 裝載的所有控制項，並執行程式碼範例的網頁。

trans-unit.source: An explanation of how to run the example page.
trans-unit.target: 如何執行範例頁面的說明。

trans-unit.source: The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更網頁上的顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page.
trans-unit.target: 將下列來源的程式碼儲存至.ascx 檔案中，指派給檔案名稱`Src`屬性`Register`指示詞的這個使用者控制項，這是主控網頁頂端附近。

trans-unit.source: For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資料會顯示此控制項中模式和原始碼的說明，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example is the source code for the interface and controls.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第二個部分是介面和控制項的原始程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The source file contains a simple interface named `IZipCode`.
trans-unit.target: 來源檔案包含一個簡單的介面，名為`IZipCode`。

trans-unit.source: There is also a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class named `ZipCodeWebPart` that implements the interface and acts as the provider control.
trans-unit.target: 另外還有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>名為類別`ZipCodeWebPart`，實作介面，並且會做為提供者控制。

trans-unit.source: Its `ProvideIZipCode` method is the callback method that implements the interface's only member.
trans-unit.target: 其`ProvideIZipCode`方法是實作介面的唯一成員的回呼方法。

trans-unit.source: The method simply returns an instance of the interface.
trans-unit.target: 方法只會傳回介面的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Note that the method is marked with a `ConnectionProvider` attribute in its metadata.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，方法標示為`ConnectionProvider`中它的中繼資料屬性。

trans-unit.source: This is the mechanism for identifying the method as the callback method for the provider's connection point.
trans-unit.target: 這是將方法識別提供者的連接點的回呼方法的機制。

trans-unit.source: The other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class is named `WeatherWebPart`, and it acts as the consumer for the connection.
trans-unit.target: 其他<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>類別的名稱為`WeatherWebPart`，並作為連接取用者。

trans-unit.source: This class has a method named `GetZipCode` that gets an instance of the `IZipCode` interface from the provider control.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別具有名為的方法`GetZipCode`所取得的執行個體`IZipCode`介面從提供者控制。

trans-unit.source: Note that this method is marked as the consumer's connection point method with a `ConnectionConsumer` attribute in its metadata.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，這個方法標示為與取用者的連接點方法`ConnectionConsumer`中它的中繼資料屬性。

trans-unit.source: This is the mechanism for identifying the connection point method in the consumer control.
trans-unit.target: 這是識別取用者控制項中的連接點方法的機制。

trans-unit.source: For the code example to run, you must compile this source code.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。

trans-unit.source: You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。

trans-unit.source: This code example uses dynamic compilation.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例會使用動態編譯。

trans-unit.source: For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).
trans-unit.target: 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。

trans-unit.source: The third part of the code example is the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第三個部分是 Web 網頁。

trans-unit.source: Near the top are `Register` directives to register the custom controls that form the connection, and the user control that enables users to change display modes on the page.
trans-unit.target: 頁面頂端附近`Register`指示詞，若要註冊連接的自訂控制項和使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更網頁上顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: The connection itself is created declaratively within the `<staticconnections>` element on the page.
trans-unit.target: 連接本身以宣告方式內建立`<staticconnections>`頁面上的元素。

trans-unit.source: This demonstrates one way of creating a connection--note the `ProviderConnectionPointID` attribute in the `<asp:webpartconnection>` element.
trans-unit.target: 這示範了一種方式建立連接的-注意`ProviderConnectionPointID`屬性`<asp:webpartconnection>`項目。

trans-unit.source: You can also create the connection programmatically; the code for doing that is in the `Button1_Click` method.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以透過程式設計的方式; 建立連線針對執行的程式碼位於`Button1_Click`方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object is created and then passed to a method that creates the actual connection.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>物件已建立，然後傳遞給建立實際連線的方法。

trans-unit.source: Whether the connection is created declaratively or programmatically, connection points must always be specified for both the provider and the consumer.
trans-unit.target: 以宣告方式或以程式設計方式建立連接時，是否提供者和取用者必須一律指定連接點。

trans-unit.source: The `Button2_Click` method accesses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint> objects for both the provider and the consumer, and writes some of their property values to a label in the page.
trans-unit.target: `Button2_Click`方法存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>物件提供者和取用者，並將部分及其屬性值寫入頁面中的標籤。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser, click the **Connection Point Details** button.
trans-unit.target: 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，請按一下**連接點的詳細資料** 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Information about the provider and consumer connection points established in the declarative connection appears.
trans-unit.target: 宣告式的連接中所建立的提供者和消費者連接點相關的資訊會出現。

trans-unit.source: Next, use the **Display Mode** drop-down control to switch the page into connect mode.
trans-unit.target: 接下來，使用**顯示模式**切換到頁面的下拉式清單控制項的連接模式。

trans-unit.source: On the verbs menu of the **ZIP Code Consumer**<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control (represented by a downward arrow in the title bar), click the connect verb.
trans-unit.target: 上的動詞命令功能表**郵遞區號消費者**<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項 （由標題列中的向下箭號表示），按一下 連接的動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: The connection UI appears, created automatically by the `<asp:connectionszone>` control declared in the page.
trans-unit.target: 自動的連接 UI 出現時，建立`<asp:connectionszone>`控制項在頁面中宣告。

trans-unit.source: This is another way of creating a connection (through the UI), along with the declarative and programmatic methods discussed earlier.
trans-unit.target: 這是另一種建立連線 （透過 UI)，以及先前所討論的宣告式和程式設計方法。

trans-unit.source: Click the **Disconnect** button to terminate the existing static connection.
trans-unit.target: 按一下**中斷連線**終止現有的靜態連接 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Click the **Create a Connection to a Provider** link.
trans-unit.target: 按一下**建立提供者的連接**連結。

trans-unit.source: The UI now displays a drop-down control that lists the provider connection point display name.
trans-unit.target: UI 現在會顯示列出提供者連接點的顯示名稱的下拉式清單控制項。

trans-unit.source: Select the connection point in the drop-down list, and then click **Connect** to complete the connection.
trans-unit.target: 在下拉式清單中，選取 連接點，然後按一下**連接**完成連線。

trans-unit.source: Next, click **Disconnect** again.
trans-unit.target: 接下來，按一下**中斷連線**一次。

trans-unit.source: Then, click the **Dynamic Connection** button to create a connection programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 然後，按一下 [**動態連接**] 按鈕，以程式設計方式建立的連接。

trans-unit.source: Use the **Display Mode** control to return the page to browse mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用**顯示模式**返回頁面，即可瀏覽模式的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Click the **Connection Point Details** button again, to once more indicate details about the provider connection point object.
trans-unit.target: 按一下**連接點的詳細資料** 按鈕，表示提供者連接點物件的相關詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: The example has demonstrated establishing a connection and using a provider connection point in three ways: a static connection declared in the Web page markup; a connection created in code that used a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object; and a connection created by a user through the connection UI.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範建立連線，並使用提供者連接點三種方式： 靜態連接標記中宣告的網頁。使用的程式碼中建立的連線<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>物件，並透過連線 UI 使用者所建立的連線。

trans-unit.source: The method in the provider control that returns an interface instance to consumers to establish a connection.
trans-unit.target: 提供者控制項中的方法，傳回介面執行個體至消費者以建立連接。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the interface that the provider serves to consumers.
trans-unit.target: 提供者為消費者所提供之介面的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the provider control with which the provider connection point is associated.
trans-unit.target: 與提供者連接點關聯之提供者控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: A friendly display name for the provider connection point that appears to users in the connection user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: 提供者連接點的易記顯示名稱，在連接使用者介面 (UI) 中向使用者顯示。

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier for the provider connection point.
trans-unit.target: 提供者連接點的唯一識別項。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating whether the provider connection point can have multiple simultaneous connections with consumers.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出提供者連接點是否可以同時連接到多個消費者。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint.%23ctor%2A> constructor for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> class simply calls the base constructor, passing to it the various parameters and initializing the base class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint.%23ctor%2A>建構函式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>類別只會呼叫基底建構函式，將各種不同的參數傳遞給它，並初始化基底類別。

trans-unit.source: The base class constructor checks a number of the parameters for a connection point and can throw several exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別建構函式會檢查幾個連接點的參數，並可能會擲回某些例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For a list of possible exceptions, see the Exceptions section.
trans-unit.target: 如需可能的例外狀況的清單，請參閱例外狀況 > 一節。

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create your own instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> class.
trans-unit.target: 您可以呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint.%23ctor%2A>建構函式來建立您自己的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>類別。

trans-unit.source: However, in cases where you are simply establishing a connection and not extending the class, you should call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.GetProviderConnectionPoints%2A> method to return an existing connection point object from a provider.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您只建立連線，並不會擴充類別，您應該呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.GetProviderConnectionPoints%2A>方法，以從提供者傳回現有的連接點物件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> class to create a custom provider connection point.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何從衍生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>類別來建立自訂提供者連接點。

trans-unit.source: The code example has three parts:
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例包含三個部分：

trans-unit.source: A source file that contains a provider <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, a consumer <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: 包含提供者的原始程式檔<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制，取用者<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，以及自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>物件。

trans-unit.source: A Web page that hosts the controls in a static connection.
trans-unit.target: 裝載控制項中的靜態連接的網頁。

trans-unit.source: An explanation of how to run the example code.
trans-unit.target: 如何執行範例程式碼的說明。

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example is the source for the provider and consumer <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, and a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> class, named `TableProviderConnectionPoint`.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第一個部分是提供者和消費者的來源<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，以及自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>類別，名為`TableProviderConnectionPoint`。

trans-unit.source: Note that the constructor of the `TableProviderConnectionPoint` class calls the base constructor, passing it the required parameters as indicated in the Parameters section.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，建構函式`TableProviderConnectionPoint`類別會呼叫基底的建構函式，將其傳遞必要的參數，參數 > 一節所示。

trans-unit.source: Also note that in the `TableProviderWebPart` class, the `GetConnectionInterface` method is specified as the callback method for connections, and the `ConnectionProvider` attribute declares the custom `TableProviderConnectionPoint` as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 也請注意，在`TableProviderWebPart`類別`GetConnectionInterface`方法指定為回呼方法，以進行連線，而`ConnectionProvider`屬性宣告自訂`TableProviderConnectionPoint`做為參數。

trans-unit.source: This demonstrates how to create a custom provider connection point and then associate it with a provider control.
trans-unit.target: 這示範了如何建立自訂提供者連接點，然後將其關聯提供者控制。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the source code is dynamically compiled, so you should place the source code file in an App_Code subfolder of your Web application.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設，動態編譯的原始程式碼，所以您應將原始程式碼檔放在 Web 應用程式的 App_Code 子資料夾。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the custom controls in a static Web Parts connection.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第二個部分是靜態的 Web 組件連接中的自訂控制項裝載的網頁。

trans-unit.source: At the top of the page is a `Register` directive to declare a prefix and the namespace for the custom controls.
trans-unit.target: 在頁面頂端`Register`指示詞來宣告前置詞和自訂控制項的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The connection is declared by using an `<asp:webpartconnection>` element, and the provider and consumer controls are declared within an `<asp:webpartzone>` element.
trans-unit.target: 宣告可透過連接`<asp:webpartconnection>`控制項項目，以及提供者和消費者中宣告了`<asp:webpartzone>`項目。

trans-unit.source: Load the page in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 載入瀏覽器中。

trans-unit.source: The connection between the controls already exists, and the consumer displays the data from the provider, because the connection was declared as a static connection in the page.
trans-unit.target: 已經控制項之間的連線存在，並取用者顯示的資料提供者，因為連接已宣告為靜態連接頁面中。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="callbackMethod" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="callbackMethod" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="interfaceType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="interfaceType" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="controlType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="controlType" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="displayName" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="displayName" /> 為 <see langword="null" /> 或空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="controlType" /> is not the same type as the provider control (or a valid class derived from it).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="controlType" /> 與提供者控制項 (或從它衍生的有效類別) 的類型不同。

trans-unit.source: The control acting as the provider in a Web Parts connection.
trans-unit.target: 做為 Web 組件連接之提供者的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the callback method in a provider control that gets an interface instance to return to consumers.
trans-unit.target: 叫用提供者控制項的回呼方法，取得要傳回至消費者的介面執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is an instance of the interface a provider returns to consumers to establish a connection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，為提供者傳回至消費者的介面執行個體，用以建立連接。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an object from the provider control that is an instance of the interface used to establish a connection.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回物件，從用來建立連接的介面的執行個體提供者控制。

trans-unit.source: The type of the object will be the type of the implemented interface.
trans-unit.target: 物件的型別會實作介面的型別。

trans-unit.source: For example, two interfaces that are implemented for connections in the Web Parts control set are <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartField> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，兩個實作介面中 Web 組件控制項集合是連線<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartField>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow>。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint.GetObject%2A> method is called on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object, if the associated provider implements one of these interfaces, the returned object will be of the same type.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint.GetObject%2A>上呼叫方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>物件，如果相關聯的提供者會實作這些介面之一，傳回的物件都屬於相同類型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint.GetObject%2A> method is called by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> objects when a connection is being activated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint.GetObject%2A>方法透過呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>物件正在啟動連線時。

trans-unit.source: This is a critical step that actually initiates a connection and begins the process that enables two controls to share data.
trans-unit.target: 這是實際起始的連線，並開始的程序，可讓共用資料的兩個控制項的重要步驟。

trans-unit.source: The consumer control in a connection must be able to work with the same type of interface as the provider.
trans-unit.target: 取用者中的控制項的連接必須能夠使用的相同介面的型別為提供者。

trans-unit.source: If it does not, the controls are incompatible and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> object must be used to establish a connection.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在，會不相容的控制項和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>物件必須用來建立連接。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="control" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="control" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The control acting as the provider in a Web Parts connection.
trans-unit.target: 做為 Web 組件連接之提供者的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets an optional collection of secondary interfaces that can be supported by a provider connection point.
trans-unit.target: 取得提供者連接點所支援之次要介面的選擇性集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionInterfaceCollection" /> of additional interfaces provided by the control acting as a provider.
trans-unit.target: 做為提供者之控制項所提供之其他介面的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionInterfaceCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: A provider connection point object always has a default interface that is used to establish a connection with consumers.
trans-unit.target: 提供者連接點物件一律會有預設介面用來建立與取用者的連線。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the default interface is retrieved by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint.GetObject%2A> method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: 預設介面的執行個體藉由呼叫擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint.GetObject%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>物件。

trans-unit.source: However, some provider controls will implement multiple interfaces to provide to consumers as part of a connection.
trans-unit.target: 不過，某些提供者的控制項將會實作多個介面，提供給取用者連接的一部分。

trans-unit.source: These interfaces, which are not the default ones used to establish a connection, are called secondary interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 這些介面，沒有預設值，用來建立連接，稱為次要介面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint.GetSecondaryInterfaces%2A> method provides a way to return a collection of references to the secondary interfaces, just as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint.GetObject%2A> method returns a reference to the default interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint.GetSecondaryInterfaces%2A>方法可用來傳回的第二個介面，參考的集合一樣<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint.GetObject%2A>方法會傳回預設介面的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint.GetSecondaryInterfaces(System.Web.UI.Control)" /> method in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint" /> class contains no implementation; it returns an empty collection of secondary interfaces.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint.GetSecondaryInterfaces(System.Web.UI.Control)" />方法中的<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint" />類別沒有實作; 它會傳回空集合的第二個介面。

trans-unit.source: To implement this method, you must inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint" /> class, and override this method, returning from it a specific set of secondary interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 若要實作這個方法，您必須繼承自<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint" />類別，並覆寫這個方法，從它傳回一組特定的輔助介面。
